messages.message: Hi team! We have the annual docker license renewal coming up. With crafting, I expect most of us not utilizing docker on our laptops. Is there anyone using docker on their laptop?
yes, there are many use cases requiring local docker

To clarify - 'local docker' doesn't necessarily mean "licensable Docker Desktop".

Use of a local docker engine from any linux environment is not in scope for license renewal, I'd imagine, but will let Ashish confirm or deny that. :smile:
